# ðŸš€ Introduction 

Our Dev Portal provides three modern and intuitive templates to enhance your development experience: <Link to="/docs/templates/dyte" >Dyte</Link>, <Link to="/docs/templates/chaos-mesh" >Chaos Mesh</Link>, and <Link to="/docs/templates/homarr" >Homarr</Link>. These templates have been carefully customized from pre-existing designs to ensure a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.

## ðŸ“Œ Why use our templates?  
  Each template has been designed to offer:

* **A modern UI/UX:** optimised for ease of reading and use.

* **Dark and light modes:** Choose the theme that best suits your preferences.

* **Improved navigation:** Intuitive layouts to optimise your workflow.

* **Consistency:** A uniform experience across all templates, while maintaining their unique characteristics.

## ðŸ›  How to use? 

    To use a template, start the CLI and select the <code>Choose a Template</code> option. 
    You can then choose <code>List Templates</code> to view the available ones or 
    <code>Use Template</code> to select and apply the desired template.

To explore each template in detail, check out the individual pages:

Choose the template that fits your style and optimize your API development experience with Quantum API Dev Portal!
